data.name: M6Allele
data.description: M6Allele: A toolkit for detection of allele-specific RNA N6-methyladenosine modifications

evidence: README container command: "docker run -v /path/to/your_work_directory:/data renlab303/m6allelepipe -f AseGeneDetection -s sample.txt -gzip true -se true -fa your_fasta_file.fa -g your_gtf_file.gtf"

"We have developed an algorithm called **M6Allele** for identifying allele-specific m6A modifications. To facilitate its usage by researchers, we have also encapsulated our analysis process into a pipeline."

Usage is via running commands like `docker run ... renlab303/m6allelepipe -f AseGeneDetection ...` and `java -jar ./M6Allele.jar AseGeneDetection` to detect ASE genes and ASM m6A signals, i.e., an analysis application.
